评论详情: I bought this ring in May '22 and haven't taken it off since I got it. So, almost 3 years. It hasn't turned my finger green. It hasn't bent/gotten damaged. I get compliments on it regularly ("Is that s mood ring!?"). The colors still change. I love this ring! Highly recommend.
stone fell out at work don't know where.

I got this for a birthday present from my great great grandma. It is not a mood ring, it does not change color. It's some reflective material that reflects different colors in different angles of light. It DOES NOT change colors, it reflects different colors. You can see what i mean in the photos and video. AND, the ring isn't even filled in all the way, as you can see in the photos. I'm only keeping this because my grandma would be so sad and think she picked the wrong ring. SCAM
It is not what I expected and it doesn’t change colors as promised

评论概述: Arrived with a damaged mood stone
评论详情: The ring is cute, but it arrived with a broken mood stone. There is a dark bubble in it, which indicates that the top clear acrylic layer has become separated from the color changing layer. Unfortunately returning this product before even using it.

Who doesn't like mood rings? This one isn't a cheap ring with a stone on top. It's actually well crafted and the stone is elegant. And, of course, it's fun to check your mood.

This ring is super cute... got it for my daughter and she loved it... would highly recommend this mood ring.

Wow, mood rings are cool again. Who knew? I wore a mood ring in my teens and now my daughter is rocking this one! Of course ,she wished I ordered her a bigger size, but I never do anything correctly in her eyes anyhow. This ring is silver and very nice. The quality is good and I ordered her a size 6. Make sure if you are ordering this for a teenage girl, you go bigger but she will love it! Nice ring and it will hopefully tell her she's always moody!
There is a small ring around the base that doesn't change color but it doesn't bother me, I think this is super pretty, changes color often, made well for the price! cute
I remember these rings when I was young. Works the same! My daughter loves it! It really changes colors which is alot of fun and the look of the ring is nice for everyday wear.
This cute lil ring got here fast! Love it!!
I have this mood ring to my niece and she was thrilled. A size 7 was too big for an 8 year old, if that’s helpful for sizing. It still works, came with a little chart, and is a lot of fun.

I ordered this ring for my daughter because she a big fan of unique jewelry. This mood ring is as shown in the photos but the gem is smaller than we expected it to be.  It actually works well as a mood ring, but it did not fit her any other finger other than her pinky. I would recommend double-checking the size before ordering.
Its so pretty and unique haven't had a mood ring since I was little this is so cool it has a little bit of glitter inside its really pretty
I like this ring, it's comfortable, fun, fits well...and best of all it won't tarnish on my finger. I definitely recommend it.

评论概述: Poor Quality Control in Color Changing Portion of Cabochon, Too Little Filling and Off Center Inside
评论详情: I was happy to find a mood ring that had a stainless steel band, but was very disappointed in how there is a major defect in the color changing cabachon itself. There's some sort of clear glitter base on one side, then there's a portion of a globule of “color changing stuff” off to the side. It's not like in the photos. From looking at this, there's not much if any quality control happening prior to sending these out, as this one would have been held back.  The small amount that there is of the “color changing stuff” does change like a mood ring cabochon should. The stainless steel band is nicely done and basic. However off-kilter and unbalanced way that the color changing portion is done seriously detracts from the ring itself, especially at the current price point of over 20 bucks. Sadly, despite being one of the few mood rings that I am aware of that offer stainless steel bands, the poor quality control of the color changing material/filling is enough to make me look elsewhere. Thanks for reading.

The Ello Elli 1.5mm Oval Stainless-Steel Mood Ring is a simple stainless steel ring with a color changing acrylic mood stone. This makes a nice gift and also makes for some fun conversation about the mood reading. The ring comes in an attractive jewelry box which can be stuffed in a gift bag. I'm happy with the ring in general and my biggest complaint is the band which isn't highly polished and is slightly dull.
Cute ring. Dainty. Works like a mood ring. Packaged beautifully and ready for gift giving.
